title: I and Nothing
description: I One Word Yet Means ManyIndependenceIsolationLonelinessWords, which perfectly sum upMeHow much risk or less to be in love?Especially when you have nothing?This is my story towards my boring life from nothingness to having at least a pinch of happiness. Can I do it? Am I capable of loving?Do I deserve it?Or I was born to be just be me? Noting else?
author: Rodolfo Mendoza
